dict.acceptation: 记录，记载；档案，履历；唱片；最高纪录；

sent.orig: From the primitive record, literal record and image record, human beings experienced 3 stages.
sent.trans: 人类的记录方式经历了原始记录、图文记录和影像记录三个阶段。

sent.orig: Client Service Record Copy of Record; Build One Record of Each Client Database.
sent.trans: 客户服务记录：每个公司每个客户都记录在我们的数据库里。

sent.orig: Communication record: the function supports synchronization record during the communication process.
sent.trans: 通话录音：支持通话过程的同步录音。

sent.orig: Li Ning Company to product development, as a self-generating record, the record of the race.
sent.trans: 李宁公司把产品的研发，看作一个不断创造纪录、刷新纪录的赛程。

sent.orig: The Bobby Charlton record? That would be a lovely record to have.
sent.trans: 博比查尔顿的记录？这是一个伟大的记录。
